org.openmuc.jdlms.client.hdlc.common
Class HdlcFrame

java.lang.Object
  org.openmuc.jdlms.client.hdlc.common.HdlcFrame

public class HdlcFrame
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a complete HDLC frame ready to be sent, excluding opening and closing flag

setInformationFrame

public void setInformationFrame(int sendSeq,
                                int receiveSeq,
                                byte[] data,
                                boolean isSegmented)
Prepares this HdlcFrame object to be sent as Information frame

Parameters:
sendSeq - Send sequence number of this frame
receiveSeq - Expected sequence number of the next frame to be received
data - Information data to be sent
isSegmented - True frame is part of a bigger message

setReceiveNotReady

public void setReceiveNotReady(int receiveSeq,
                               boolean poll)
Prepares this HdlcFrame object to be sent as ReceiveNotReady frame

Parameters:
receiveSeq - Expected sequence number of the next frame to be received
poll - True if remote end point is allowed to send data

Parameters:

poll - True if remote end point is allowed to send data

                                     boolean poll)
Prepares this HdlcFrame object to be sent as SetNormalResponseMode frame

Parameters:
negotiationParams - Client connection values to be negotiated. May be null
poll - True if remote end point is allowed to send data

Parameters:

Parameters:

decode

public void decode(java.io.InputStream iStream)
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   FrameInvalidException
Decodes a byte array containing an HDLC frame into this object

Parameters:
iStream - InputStream pointing at the beginning of the HDLC frame
Throws:
java.io.IOException
FrameInvalidException

encode

public byte[] encode()
              throws FrameInvalidException
Encodes a HdlcFrame object to its corresponding byte array representation. Before this method is called, make sure that one of the setter methods or decode has been called to create a valid HDLC frame or a FrameInvalidException is thrown.

Returns:
Byte array representing this HdlcFrame object
Throws:
FrameInvalidException
